attributes.action: Release CCTV from No 10 on the 18/12/20 with regards to the Tory Christmas party
attributes.additional_details: CCTV release followed by independent investgstion to elucidate the truth.
attributes.background: The public need to clearly understand what took place. If the PM insists there was no party, then he should have no hesitation in releasing CCTV.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that are effectively freedom of information requests.

You can find out how to make a freedom of information (FOI) request here: https://www.gov.uk/make-a-freedom-of-information-request
